templates.name: How do I create a custom bracelet?
templates.content: You can do that here: https://www.mantraband.com/products/custom?utm_campaign=concierge&utm_medium=text&utm_source=attentive&externalId=89eqo The first thing you'll choose is the placement of your message (on the outside, inside, or both). Next, depending on the side you chose, you'll see an empty text field labeled 'Your Mantra'. You can add up to 60 characters in there, and choose between the three available colors. Finally, simply click on 'Add To Bag' and proceed to checkout.

templates.name: Do orders come with receipts?
templates.content: We include a gift receipt with no price info in all shipments, which can be used for returns and exchanges. If you wish to gift our items, the recipient will not know the cost of the gift.

templates.name: Can I use apostrophes or dashes?

templates.name: If I have both in-stock and custom items in my order, will they ship together? Or will the one in stock ship ahead/first?
templates.content: Any in-stock items in your order will ship in 1-2 business days!

templates.name: Do you have longer chains for Mandalas?
templates.content: At this time we only offer 20" chains with mandalas, and we don't have larger/longer chains.

templates.name: Can I get my points back if I used it for a purchase and I returned what I bought with those points?
templates.content: Yes! If you used your reward credits to make a purchase, you'll receive them back if you return the items.

templates.name: Do you accept Tax Exemption Forms?
templates.content: Yes, we do! Just send us the exempt form and number at support@mantraband.com. Our team's happy to help!

templates.name: Do your rings come with a chain?
templates.content: All rings come with a chain.

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: We don't offer phone support right now but I'd be happy to help you over text, let me know what I can do for you!

templates.name: Where do you ship from?
templates.content: Our items ship from Nevada.

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: Production time for custom orders is approximately 10-12 weeks as they're made to order. We usually ship via USPS, UPS, FedEx and DHL, and once shipped it will take 5-7 business days domestically and 2-3 weeks internationally.

templates.name: Sizing / fit
templates.content: MantraBand bracelets are fully adjustable and will fit most wrist sizes!
